fields.label: Auto Approve All Orders
fields.description: If checked, all new orders from any shop will be automatically approved upon creation.

fields.label: Enable Refund System
fields.description: Enable or disable the entire order refund system.

fields.label: Auto Approve Parcel Orders
fields.description: If checked, all new parcel orders will be automatically approved.

fields.label: Enable Refund Deletion
fields.description: Allow admins or sellers to- delete refund requests.

fields.label: Enable Auto-Assign Deliveryman
fields.description: Automatically assign a deliveryman to an order when it is accepted.

fields.label: Enable Auto-Print Order
fields.description: Automatically print an order receipt when the order is accepted.

fields.label: Enable Driver To Edit Credentials
fields.description: Allow drivers to edit their own profile information (excluding sensitive fields like ID numbers).

fields.label: Require Phone Number for Order
fields.description: If checked, a phone number will be a required field when creating a new order.

fields.label: Auto Approve Categories
fields.description: If checked, new categories created by sellers will be automatically approved.

fields.label: Auto Approve Products
fields.description: If checked, new products created by sellers will be automatically approved.

fields.label: Enable Parcel System
fields.description: Enable or disable the entire parcel delivery feature.

fields.label: Enable Referral Earnings
fields.description: Enable the system that automatically awards earnings for successful referrals.

fields.label: Enable Reservation System
fields.description: Enable or disable the booking/reservation system for users.

fields.label: Enable Vendor Subscriptions
fields.description: Enable the subscription model for vendors/sellers.

fields.label: Enable Commission Model
fields.description: Enable the commission-based model for vendors/sellers.

fields.label: Enable Group Orders
fields.description: Enable the feature for users to create group orders.

fields.label: Enable PaaS Lending
fields.description: Enable or disable the entire PaaS lending feature.
